experiences.title: Full Stack Developer
experiences.description: Build and maintain critical components used to construct Klaviyo’s frontend, across the whole product. Work closely with cross-functional teams, including developers, designers, and product managers, to implement and advocate for best practices in web accessibility.

experiences.title: Full Stack Web Developer
experiences.description: Designed and developed a responsive B2C website and dynamic Admin Panel from scratch (Figma → ReactJS) with intuitive user flows, reusable components, scalable architecture, and Redux-based state management for seamless user experiences.
